title: Cross-Population Intersectionality Analysis
prompt: An overhead shot of a worn kitchen table scattered with overlapping papers—medical bills, insurance forms, prescription bottles, a veteran's hat, a tribal bracelet—bathed in soft morning light from a window, with weathered hands of indeterminate age sorting through the documents; shot in documentary style with shallow depth of field, muted blues and earth tones, conveying the material weight of intersecting burdens without showing faces or evoking pity.
